Jelaskan Fungsi Wakil Panglima, Moeldoko Jamin Tak Ada Dualisme di TNI
07 Nov 2019, 12:48 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Kepala Staf Kepresidenan (KSP) Moeldoko menjelaskan pentingnya pos wakil panglima dalam struktur TNI. Wakil Panglima TNI dinilai bisa mempermudah urusan pelimpahan wewenang jika Panglima TNI tengah bertugas ke luar negeri.
"Selama ini (jika) panglima pergi, perlu membuat surat, menunjuk satu kepala staf angkatan, sebagai (Pelaksana) Panglima. Kalau nanti tidak perlu lagi karena panglima dan wapang dalam satu kotak," kata Moeldoko di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Dengan demikian, kata Moeldoko, Wakil Panglima TNI tinggal melaksanakan tugas menggantikan sementara panglima. Dia mengatakan, tidak ada pertimbangan politik soal aturan yang diteken Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
"Wapang otomatis bisa melakukan action sebagai panglima. Nggak ribet, lebih mudah untuk efektif dalam melaksanakan organisasi. itu pertimbangannya, sangat teknikal, sangat organisatoris, tidak ada pertimbangan politik, atau pertimbangan lain," kata eks Panglima TNI ini.
Lebih lanjut, Moeldoko menjamin tidak ada dualisme di TNI terkait posisi wakil panglima. "Nggak. Di tentara nggak ada dualisme. Kalau nggak beres, tetep yang salah di bawah. apalagi kalau tentara dikatakan insubkoordinasi, pidana. dikatakan tidak loyal, mati kariernya. Tentara itu paling gampang," ujar Moeldoko.
Ketentuan soal wakil panglima tertuang dalam Perpres Nomor 66/2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi TNI yang diteken Jokowi pada 18 Oktober 2019. Di Pasal 15 Perpres dijelaskan wakil panglima merupakan koordinator pembinaan kekuatan TNI guna mewujudkan interoperabilitas/Tri Matra Terpadu, yang berkedudukan di bawah dan bertanggung jawab kepada panglima.

Explain the Function of Deputy Commander in Chief, Moeldoko Guarantees There Is No Dualism in the TNI
Nov 7 2019, 12:48 by Andhika Prasetia
Jakarta - Presidential Chief of Staff (KSP) Moeldoko explained the importance of the deputy commander post in the TNI structure. Deputy TNI Commander is considered to be able to simplify matters of delegating authority if the TNI Commander is on duty overseas.
"So far (if) the commander has left, it is necessary to make a letter, appointing a chief of staff of the force, as (Commander) Commander. If later there is no need because the commander and the commander in one box," said Moeldoko at the Presidential Palace Complex, Central Jakarta, Thursday (11/7/2019).
Thus, said Moeldoko, the Deputy Commander of the TNI was left to carry out the task of replacing the temporary commander. He said, there was no political consideration regarding the rules signed by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi).
"Wapang can automatically carry out actions as commander in chief. It's not complicated, it's easier to be effective in carrying out organizations. That's the consideration, very technical, very organizational, no political considerations, or other considerations," said the former TNI Commander.
Furthermore, Moeldoko guarantees that there is no dualism in the TNI regarding the position of deputy commander. "No, there is no dualism in the army. If it goes wrong, it is still wrong at the bottom. Especially if the army is said to be insubordinated, criminal. It is said to be disloyal, career dead. The army is the easiest," said Moeldoko.
Provisions concerning the deputy commander's issue are contained in Perpres Number 66/2019 concerning the Organizational Structure of the TNI which was signed by Jokowi on October 18, 2019. In Article 15 of the Perpres it is explained that the deputy commander is the coordinator of the TNI's power development in order to realize interoperability / Tri Matra Integrated, which is under and responsible to the commander.
